title: Himiway 2 Pairs Bike Disc Brake Pads Competible with TRP Tektro Shimano Deore Br-M575 M525 M515 T615 T675 M505 M495 M486 M485 M475 M465 M447 M446 M445 M416 M415 M395 M375 M315 M355 C601 C501
features: QUALITY MATERIAL: The bike brake pads are made of quality Ceramic material without iron and harmful substances, which can reduce the initial bite time and reduce the noise, suitable for smooth road riding. They have good stability and the friction coefficient is not easy to change.

PRACTICAL AND DURABLE: When you're riding your bike you want responsive and quick-reacting brakes. The Himiway disc brake pads are the perfect thickness and good braking effect, which is not easy to fray and crack, safe, stable, noiseless, greater longevity, good wear resistance and heat resistance.
COMFORTABLE: The performance of our Ceramic brake pads are mature and stable. They feature Low disk wear and comfortable braking feel, stable, durable and excellent power modulation.

INSTALLATION: To install firstly remove your front and rear disc brake. Then straighten the old pin. Remove the old, worn brake pads from the front and rear calipers. Insert the new brake pads correctly and secure them inside the caliper with the spring and pin. At last check the disc rotor positioning. Make sure there is no friction with the new brake pads when the brakes are not in use.

COMPATIBLE WITH: Before ordering check your current brake pads for compatibility, or check online to match the brand and make with the correct pads before buying. The Himiway bike disc brake pads are compatible with TRP Tektro, Shimano Deore Br-M575, M525, M515, T615, T675, M505, M495, M486, M485, M475, M465, M447, M446, M445, M416, M415, M395, M375, M315, M355, C601, and C501.
